CustomField.description: Use this option to change the input text controls background color in survey responder interface. Use hex or RGB color code as a value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Input Text Background Color allows you to customize the background color of input controls in the survey responder interface. You can use either a hex color code (e.g., #RRGGBB) or an RGB color code (e.g., rgb(R, G, B)) as the value.
CustomField.label: Input Text Background Color
